thread.title: Alabama recruiting podcast: Analyzing the recent commitment of QB Jake Fromm
thread.title_full: Alabama recruiting podcast: Analyzing the recent commitment of QB Jake Fromm

author: Drew Champlin | dchamplin@al.com
title: Alabama recruiting podcast: Analyzing the recent commitment of QB Jake Fromm
text:
In this edition of Champ's Corner: Alabama recruiting podcast, hosts Drew Champlin and film analyst Mark Jennings talk about Warner Robins, Ga., quarterback Jake Fromm's commitment to Alabama (with my apologies on mispronouncing Houston County High School). 
The podcast also includes an interview with Fromm. 
The hosts discuss if Khalid Kareem's decommitment was a surprise and where Alabama goes at defensive end/JACK linebacker from here. 
More topics discussed include the injury recovery of Alabama commit Shawn Jennings and the athleticism of Alabama defensive line commit Quinnen Williams. 
The podcast is part of the VSporto sports network and can be found on BamaSportsRadio.com along with other Alabama-related podcasts. 
Take a listen and leave your thoughts or questions for next week's podcast below.
